comment.author: Virginia
comment.text: Rudy Giuliani admits that Trump campaign had advanced warning from the FBI about Comey's letter. Rudy admits FBI agents were leaking internal details of Clinton investigation to partisan in Trump camp (him). It is a shame! #VoteHillary - http://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/rudy-giuliani-fbi-clinton-emails_us_581c9e3fe4b0e80b02c93d6b

replies.author: Amber
replies.text: It doesn't matter if Trump knew what matters is she committed a crime having a authority office is called Treason

replies.author: Allen
replies.text: What was it Trump said, drain the swamp? I hope Hillary does, starting with the FBI! Vote blue ALL the way! Let's take the house and the Senate!

replies.author: Allen
replies.text: Amber so your OK with the FBI committing a crime to show Hillary committed a crime? (Which turns out she didn't) you people are as dumb as Trump just trying to make up and change the rules to benefit himself as he goes.

replies.author: Cody
replies.text: Seriously, I just can't believe that Liberals are so dumb not to see that Hillary is a criminal, not by the wikileaks but by being investigated by the FBI on two investigation and more likely she will be indicted.
